/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly gray and white, punctuated by occasional red and blue accents that add a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalks, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The sky overhead is a blanket of gray, hinting at the overcast weather conditions.
